name: The Beautiful Uncut Hair of Graves
name_original: The Beautiful Uncut Hair of Graves
description:
Entry for Global Game Jam 2020, theme of 'Repair.' Repair in this sense is nature regrowing over an abandoned wasteland. Players control various ecosystems, and must balance their internal needs for energy with the desire to expand.  1-4 local players.

Status: Fairly buggy but *mostly* works. You can get to an end state and determine a winner. Currently, the camera is wonky sometimes, which could affect folks who are sensitive to quick-moving cameras in games. Will hopefully keep updating!

Credits:

Adam Schoelz - Programming, Design

Kate Mellon - Art, Design

Nicholas Reynolds - Tech Art

Ian Gibbs - Music
